Where is it? Bear Island, Svalbard [74.43137835, 19.058443166]
What's in the photo? Atmospheric vortices in the clouds and a swirling algal bloom in the ocean
Which satellite took the photo? NASA A… [+3496 chars]

articles.author: Srishti Gupta
articles.title: Fishy fossil: 72-million-year-old sea monster species could be fake, says study - Yahoo! Voices
articles.description: A fossil once hailed as evidence of a unique mosasaur species, Xenodens calminechari, may be a forgery, a new study claims.
articles.content:
A fossil once hailed as evidence of a unique mosasaur species, Xenodens calminechari, may be a forgery, a new study claims.
The 72-million-year-old fossil, described in 2021, includes a partial jawb… [+3972 chars]

articles.title: Spiky fossils Punk and Emo change our understanding of molluscan evolution - Nature.com
articles.description: Two fossils from about 430 million years ago suggest early worm-like molluscs were more diverse than the group is today.
